subject: A new user account has been created and is pending approval
template:
Hi ${ADMIN_USERNAME},
You are receiving this email because you are a qDAR Administrator
A new user registration is pending admin approval
Full-name : ${USER_FULL_NAME}
Username : ${USERNAME}
Email : ${USER_EMAIL}
Organization : ${USER_ORG}
Account source : ${ACCOUNT_SOURCE}
Sincerely,
QDAR Team.

subject: Your qDAR account has been approved!
template:
Hi ${USERNAME},
Your account has been approved.
Sincerely,
QDAR Team.

subject: Your qDAR account has been locked
template:
Hi ${USERNAME},
Your account has been locked.
Sincerely,
QDAR Team.

subject: Your qDAR account has been unlocked
template:
Hi ${USERNAME},
Your account has been unlocked.
Sincerely,
QDAR Team.

subject: Your change password request
template:
Hi ${USERNAME},
You have requested to change your password, to do so please follow the link ${LINK}, the link will expire at ${EXPIRATION}.
Sincerely,
QDAR Team.

subject: You've been granted a new role
template:
Hi ${USERNAME},
You have been granted a new role "${ROLE}".
Sincerely,
QDAR Team.

subject: Your account has been deleted
template:
Hi ${USERNAME},
Your account has been deleted.
Sincerely,
QDAR Team.

subject: Your account information has been updated
template:
Hi ${USERNAME},
Your account information has been updated.
Sincerely,
QDAR Team.

subject: A new report has been published
template:
Hi ${USERNAME},
A new report has been published to IIS "${IIS}".
Sincerely,
QDAR Team.

subject: A new ADF has been uploaded
template:
Hi ${USERNAME},
A new ADF has been uploaded to IIS "${IIS}".
Sincerely,
QDAR Team.

subject: qDAR account email verification
template:
Hi ${USERNAME},
To verify your email address please follow the link ${LINK}.
this link will expire on ${EXPIRATION}.
Sincerely,
QDAR Team.
